prefixIntro.title: 后缀 -y
prefixIntro.description:
形容词后缀，表示 **“充满...的”** 或 **“有...特质的”**。
通常加在名词后，表示某种物质或性质的附着。
prefixIntro.imagery: 联想甜甜圈上撒满了糖霜✨，到处都是。

words.imagery: 像薯片一样，一折就断，边缘呈锯齿状。

sentences.en: I love the taste of crispy bacon.

words.imagery: 喇叭里传出混乱的波浪线，充满了声音。

sentences.en: There's much noise outside. It's too noisy.

sentences.en: Can I have a glass of water? I'm really thirsty.
sentences.cn: 能给我一杯水吗？我真的渴了。
